titles: A treatise concernynge generall councilles, the byshoppes of Rome, and the clergy
author: Alesius, Alexander, 1500-1565, attributed name.
publisher: In ædibus Thomæ Bertheleti regii impressoris excus.,
notes: The year "1534" appears in sill at the bottom of title page.
The Durham University Library copy is imperfect; cropped at sides, with some loss of marginal notes; lacks quire i.
Reproductions of the originals in the Durham University Library and the Lambeth Palace Library.
Appears at reel 1467 (Durham University Library copy) and at reel 1561 (Lambeth Palace Library copy).
keywords: Popes --  Temporal power --  Early works to 1800.
Church and state --  Catholic Church --  Early works to 1800.
Temporal power of religious rulers --  Early works to 1800.
